statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.88}+{8.27}\right)}={26.3}\approx{26.3}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.27}\cdot{4.77}={39.4479}\approx{39.4}.
